artist: Artist: John Biggers; Printer: Trestle Editions Limited, New York; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: From a print portfolio consisting of five black-and-white lithographs, plus the title and colophon pages, illustrating the Maya Angelou poem "Our Grandmothers" (1990); housed in cloth-covered clamshell box
markings: Numbered in pencil, LL: HC V
provenance: The Limited Edtions Club, New York (publisher); sold to MIA, 1998.
signed: Signed in pencil, LR: John Biggers
title: Untitled (Altar with Elephant Motif)
